entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
